Detailed Description

template<class T>
class ArrayReference< T >

Class that implements references to objects of the Array template class.

A reference is an Array object, that is identified by the flag "stat", which is set to "true".

Author:
M. Kreutz
Date:
1995-01-01

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class T>
ArrayReference< T >::~ArrayReference (  )  [inline]

Destructs an Array Reference object.

This destructor is important to define, because otherwise Visual C++ wouldn't call destructors of the base classes Array and ArrayBase.

Returns:
none
